properties.entry: select * from sc_keyword_searchterm where keyword_id = '{@#keywordId#}' order by platform,term_no

select sc_keyword_track.*, (select name from sc_user where sc_user.login_id = sc_keyword_track.creator ) as username from sc_keyword_track where keyword_id = '{@#keywordId#}' order by create_date desc

select t.* from sc_keyword t where t.task_id = '{@#taskId#}' {@ and t.parent_id='#parentId#' } {@ and ( cpc <= #cpc:1000# or competition <= #competition:1000# or search_volume >= #search_volume:0# ) } {@ AND result_num >= #result_num# } {@ AND (#pc|true#) } and t.is_main_keyword <> 1 and status <> 15 order by t.search_volume desc
select t.* from sc_keyword t where t.group_id= '{@#groupId#}' order by t.search_volume desc

select t.* , (select count(1) from sc_keyword sk where sk.parent_id = t.keyword_id and sk.status <> 15 and sk.is_main_keyword <> 1 ) as c from sc_keyword t where status <> 15 and t.is_main_keyword = 1 and t.task_id = '{@#taskId#}' order by t.updated_time desc
select * from sc_keyword_plan where plan_id = '{@#id#}'
select * from sc_keyword_task where task_id = '{@#id#}'
select * from sc_keyword where keyword_id = '{@#id#}'
INSERT INTO sc_keyword_plan (plan_id, NAME, memo, creator, create_date ) VALUES ('{@#guid#}', '{@#name#}', '{@#memo#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW() )
UPDATE sc_keyword_plan SET NAME = '{@#name#}' , memo = '{@#memo#}' WHERE plan_id = '{@#id#}'
INSERT INTO sc_keyword_task (task_id, plan_id, NAME, memo, creator, create_date ) VALUES ('{@#guid#}', '{@#planId#}', '{@#name#}', '{@#memo#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW() )
UPDATE sc_keyword_task SET NAME = '{@#name#}' , memo = '{@#memo#}' WHERE task_id = '{@#id#}'

INSERT INTO sc_keyword (keyword_id, task_id, keyword, is_main_keyword, parent_id, keyword_type, search_volume, main_keyword_id, cpc, competition, result_num, trends, STATUS, create_date, creator, site ) VALUES ('{@#guid#}', '{@#taskId#}', '{@#keyword#}', '{@#is_main_keyword#}', '{@#parent_id#}', '{@#keyword_type#}', '{@#search_volume#}', '{@#main_keyword_id#}', '{@#cpc#}', '{@#competition#}', '{@#result_num#}', '{@#trends#}', '10', NOW(), '{@#loginId#}', '{@#site#}' )
INSERT INTO sc_keyword_website (keyword_id, domain, url ) VALUES ('{@#mainGuid#}', '{@#domain1#}', '{@#url#}' )
select * from sc_keyword where 1=1 and is_niche = 1 and status = '30' and dev_charger = '{@#Evn.loginId#}'

SELECT saa.NAME AS ACCOUNT_NAME, srp.IMAGE_URL, srp.REAL_SKU, saap.* FROM sc_amazon_account saa, sc_amazon_account_product saap LEFT JOIN sc_real_product_rel srpr ON srpr.ACCOUNT_ID = saap.ACCOUNT_ID AND srpr.SKU = saap.SKU LEFT JOIN sc_real_product srp ON srpr.REAL_ID = srp.ID WHERE saap.asin = '{@#asin#}' AND saap.status != 'deleted' AND saap.ACCOUNT_ID = saa.ID
